cfbscrapR 0.0.1

  • Changelog

Get Team Statistics by Game

cfb_game_team_stats.Rd

Get Team Statistics by Game

cfb_game_team_stats(
  year,
  week = NULL,
  season_type = "regular",
  team = NULL,
  conference = NULL,
  game_id = NULL,
  rows_per_team = 1
)

Arguments

year

(Integer required): Year, 4 digit format (YYYY)
week

(Integer optional): Week - values range from 1-15, 1-14 for seasons pre-playoff, i.e. 2013 or earlier
season_type

(String default: regular): Select Season Type - regular, postseason, or both
team

(String optional): D-I Team
conference

(String optional): Conference abbreviation - Select a valid FBS conference Conference abbreviations P5: ACC, B12, B1G, SEC, PAC Conference abbreviations G5 and FBS Independents: CUSA, MAC, MWC, Ind, SBC, AAC
game_id

(Integer optional): Game ID filter for querying a single game Can be found using the `cfb_game_info()` function
rows_per_team

(Integer default 1): Both Teams for each game on one or two row(s), Options: 1 or 2

Examples


cfb_game_team_stats(2018, week = 1, conference = 'B12')
#> # A tibble: 9 x 78
#>       id school conference homeAway points rushingTDs puntReturnYards
#>    <int> <chr>  <chr>      <chr>     <int> <chr>      <chr>          
#> 1 4.01e8 West … Big 12     away         40 0          -1             
#> 2 4.01e8 Texas… Big 12     home         27 2          NA             
#> 3 4.01e8 Oklah… Big 12     home         58 3          -1             
#> 4 4.01e8 Kansa… Big 12     home         27 0          107            
#> 5 4.01e8 Baylor Big 12     home         55 5          38             
#> 6 4.01e8 Oklah… Big 12     home         63 5          46             
#> 7 4.01e8 Texas  Big 12     away         29 2          56             
#> 8 4.01e8 Kansas Big 12     home         23 0          26             
#> 9 4.01e8 TCU    Big 12     home         55 2          113            
#> # … with 71 more variables: puntReturnTDs <chr>, puntReturns <chr>,
#> #   passingTDs <chr>, kickReturnYards <chr>, kickReturnTDs <chr>,
#> #   kickReturns <chr>, kickingPoints <chr>, fumblesRecovered <chr>,
#> #   totalFumbles <chr>, tacklesForLoss <chr>, defensiveTDs <chr>,
#> #   tackles <chr>, sacks <chr>, qbHurries <chr>, passesDeflected <chr>,
#> #   firstDowns <chr>, thirdDownEff <chr>, fourthDownEff <chr>,
#> #   totalYards <chr>, netPassingYards <chr>, completionAttempts <chr>,
#> #   yardsPerPass <chr>, rushingYards <chr>, rushingAttempts <chr>,
#> #   yardsPerRushAttempt <chr>, totalPenaltiesYards <chr>, turnovers <chr>,
#> #   fumblesLost <chr>, interceptions <chr>, possessionTime <chr>,
#> #   interceptionYards <chr>, interceptionTDs <chr>, passesIntercepted <chr>,
#> #   conference_allowed <chr>, homeAway_allowed <chr>, points_allowed <int>,
#> #   rushingTDs_allowed <chr>, puntReturnYards_allowed <chr>,
#> #   puntReturnTDs_allowed <chr>, puntReturns_allowed <chr>,
#> #   passingTDs_allowed <chr>, kickReturnYards_allowed <chr>,
#> #   kickReturnTDs_allowed <chr>, kickReturns_allowed <chr>,
#> #   kickingPoints_allowed <chr>, fumblesRecovered_allowed <chr>,
#> #   totalFumbles_allowed <chr>, tacklesForLoss_allowed <chr>,
#> #   defensiveTDs_allowed <chr>, tackles_allowed <chr>, sacks_allowed <chr>,
#> #   qbHurries_allowed <chr>, passesDeflected_allowed <chr>,
#> #   firstDowns_allowed <chr>, thirdDownEff_allowed <chr>,
#> #   fourthDownEff_allowed <chr>, totalYards_allowed <chr>,
#> #   netPassingYards_allowed <chr>, completionAttempts_allowed <chr>,
#> #   yardsPerPass_allowed <chr>, rushingYards_allowed <chr>,
#> #   rushingAttempts_allowed <chr>, yardsPerRushAttempt_allowed <chr>,
#> #   totalPenaltiesYards_allowed <chr>, turnovers_allowed <chr>,

#> #   possessionTime_allowed <chr>, interceptionYards_allowed <chr>,
#> #   interceptionTDs_allowed <chr>, passesIntercepted_allowed <chr>
